description: Non-material amendment to planning application reference: 2023/00171/FUL allowed on appeal reference: APP/H5390/W/24/3348144 dated 4th December 2024 for the "Change of use of the ground floor and southern part of first floor from commercial (Class E) into 5no. self-contained flats (Class C3), consisting of 4 x 2 bedroom and 1 x 1 bedroom self-contained flats; replacement of 3no. single doors with new windows fronting Jeddo Road; removal of part of the existing roof to the eastern elevation of unit 2; alterations within the internal courtyard and associated works." Amendments sought are for the main entrance to the residential block to remain as existing and entrance to Unit 1 to be from the ground floor lobby, the existing refuse store and bike store to remain as existing, and the entrance to Unit 4 to be from the existing front door on Jeddo Road.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
site_name: Boot Court75 - 77 Jeddo RoadLondonW12 9ED
